thread.title: Berekum Chelsea striker Kofi Owusu vies for Premier League Board Footballer of the Season
thread.title_full: Berekum Chelsea striker Kofi Owusu vies for Premier League Board Footballer of the Season

title: Berekum Chelsea striker Kofi Owusu vies for Premier League Board Footballer of the Season
text:
Sports News | 16 October 2015 00:10 CET Berekum Chelsea striker Kofi Owusu vies for Premier League Board Footballer of the Season - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Ghana Premier League goalking Kofi Owusu is in contention for the 2014/2015 Premier League Board Footballer of the Season. 
The Berekum Cheslea forward has been shortlisted alongside AshantiGold deputy skipper and midfielder Eric Opoku and Wa All Stars goalkeeper Richard Ofori. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
